CatDescriptText: Nancy Jones, student, University of Pittsburgh, 839 Cherokee Street, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 26, 1958, pg. 6 with question: "Do you believe the trouble in Middle East will start an atomic world war?" answer reads: "Yes, I think World War III is in the making. If Russia gets 'fired up' we'll have a war."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Nancy Jones wearing hoop earrings and dark button down dress, standing in interior with light colored walls and door with window that reads "...VATE" on right
